scripts.test: tsc features/**/*.ts --outDir build_test && cp features/user.feature build_test/user.feature && ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js build_test
scripts.test_multiple: tsc features/**/*.ts --outDir build_test && cp features/multiple.case.feature build_test/multiple.case.feature && ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js build_test
scripts.test_web: tsc features/**/*.ts --outDir build_test && cp features/web.feature build_test/web.feature && ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js build_test
